languages.text: "Позвольте объяснить: Мастер вокса пыталась погладить Глейто, что активировало протокол самообороны".

traits.locale_text: "Позвольте мне объяснить. Вокс-мастер пыталась погладить Глейто. В ответ запустился протокол самообороны".

languages.text: "Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."
languages.original_text: "Позвольте объяснить: Мастер вокса пыталась погладить Глейто, что активировало протокол самообороны".

traits.locale_text: "Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."
"Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."
"Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."
"Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."
"Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."

languages.text: 「説明させてください。ヴォクス・マスターがグライトを撫でようとしたため、彼の自己防衛プロトコルが作動したのです」
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."

traits.locale_text: 「説明させてください。ヴォクス・マスターがグライトを撫でようとしたため、彼の自己防衛プロトコルが作動したのです」

languages.text: "İzninizle açıklayayım... Voks Üstadı, Glaito'yu sevmeye kalkıştı ve bu da onun savunma protokolünü devreye soktu."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."

traits.locale_text: "İzninizle açıklayayım... Voks Üstadı, Glaito'yu sevmeye kalkıştı ve bu da onun savunma protokolünü etkinleştirdi."

languages.text: «Permítame que se lo explique: la maestra de vocos intentó acariciar a Glaito, lo que activó su protocolo de autodefensa».
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."

traits.locale_text: «Permítame que se lo explique: la maestra de vocos intentó acariciar a Glaito, lo que activó su protocolo de autodefensa».

languages.text: “让我来解释一下吧：音阵大师试图抚摸格雷托，而这激活了格雷托的自我防卫程序。”
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."

traits.locale_text: “让我来解释一下吧：音阵大师试图抚摸格雷托，而这激活了格雷托的自我防卫程序。”

languages.text: « Laissez-moi vous expliquer : la maîtresse-vox a tenté de caresser Glaito, qui a donc activé son protocole de défense. »
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez-moi vous expliquer : la maîtresse-vox a tenté de caresser Glaito, qui a donc activé son protocole de défense. »

languages.text: "Erlaubt mir eine Erklärung: Die Voxmeisterin hat beim Versuch, Glaito zu streicheln, sein Selbstverteidigungsprotokoll aktiviert."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: the Vox Master tried to pet Glaito, which activated his self-defence protocol."

traits.locale_text: "Erlaubt mir eine Erklärung: Die Voxmeisterin hat beim Versuch, Glaito zu streicheln, sein Selbstverteidigungsprotokoll aktiviert."
